00060 template<unsigned DIM>
00061 class NagaiHondaForce  : public AbstractForce<DIM>
00062 {
00063 friend class TestForces;
00064 
00065 private:
00066 
00067     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00075     template<class Archive>
00076     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00077     {
00078         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractForce<DIM> >(*this);
00079         archive & mNagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter;
00080         archive & mNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter;
00081         archive & mNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00082         archive & mNagaiHondaCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00083     }
00084 
00085 protected:
00086 
00090     double mNagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter;
00091 
00095     double mNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter;
00096 
00103     double mNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00104 
00108     double mNagaiHondaCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00109 
00110

00122

00132 
00142     virtual double GetAdhesionParameter(Node<DIM>* pNodeA, Node<DIM>* pNodeB, VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>& rVertexCellPopulation);
00143 
00147     double GetNagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter();
00148 
00152     double GetNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter();
00153 
00157     double GetNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter();
00158 
00162     double GetNagaiHondaCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter();
00163 
00169     void SetNagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter(double nagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter);
00170 
00176     void SetNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter(double nagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter);
00177 
00184     void SetNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter(double nagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyEnergyParameter);
